statements: DELETE FROM fuel_reports WHERE report_id = 1 AND vehicle_id = 100
DELETE FROM fuel_reports WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' AND fuel_quantity > 50
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_report WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transportation_cost_report WHERE route_id = 456 AND date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_report WHERE fuel_consumed > 100 AND cost > 50;
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_amount < 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE max_speed < 100 AND fuel_capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 12345 AND fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
DELETE FROM vehicle WHERE brand = 'Toyota' AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM driver WHERE age > 40 OR (name = 'John Doe' AND vehicle_id IS NULL);
DELETE FROM Driver WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM Trip WHERE cost > 1000);
